name: Angry Moons
description:
You believe moonshot thinkers can’t fight pollution? Hold my climate change!

Your mission? Save the planet from pollution
How? Pick up trash and slingshot it to the moon
To the moon? Hell yeah – Shoot first, talk later!

  • Click, drag and release the trash to slingshot
  • Mouse drag, Mouse wheel or A/D  to rotate the camera
  • Code: Leo Hilbert, Ansgar Renk
  • Pixelart: Lino Mews
  • Sound: Thomas Auth
  • Website: David Ruelfing

This game was created for the November 2020 GitHub Game Off game jam.
